item.title: Scent of a Woman
item.description: For over five years Diver & Aguilar have been photographing some of the world's leading fragrance brands from Chanel to Dior & YSL. In their latest latest folio they highlight the connection the scent of the flower, which throughout history has been the unifying force that has made the scent worn by a woman as the iconic symbol of her beauty.
item.content:encoded: For over five years Diver & Aguilar have been photographing some of the world's leading fragrance brands from Chanel to Dior & YSL. In their latest latest folio they highlight the connection the scent of the flower, which throughout history has been the unifying force that has made the scent worn by a woman as the iconic symbol of her beauty.

item.title: AXN - Time Out
item.description: Once again our friends from AXN contacted us. This time for the creation of a piece to promote their Sunday marathon, offering a different prime time show each week. The main idea for "Time out" was to encourage viewers to get all needed provisions and make themselves ready to sit on the couch to enjoy their favourite TV shows for 4 hours. Just press play on the video below and enjoy. Dont miss out on the making of the project!
item.content:encoded: Once again our friends from AXN contacted us. This time for the creation of a piece to promote their Sunday marathon, offering a different prime time show each week. The main idea for "Time out" was to encourage viewers to get all needed provisions and make themselves ready to sit on the couch to enjoy their favourite TV shows for 4 hours. Just press play on the video below and enjoy. Dont miss out on the making of the project!

item.title: The Bricks Addons - Huge UI Kit for Web Designers
item.description: The Bricks is a set of user interface components and elements united in 4 add-ons: Forms, Elements, E-commerce and Words. Beautiful and clear elements are easily combined with each other, as they are made in the same style. We have created for you hundreds of well-thought elements which will ideally fit your projects. How does it work? Take the desired component. You can change its appearance, color and text according to your needs. Use the resulting component in your design. Created on 12-grid system, they like fit together like puzzles. We have also drawn for you over 150 of vector icons in terms of this pack. All of them were based on 16-pixel grid. Bricks. Take a break from routine and work on new ideas.
item.content:encoded: The Bricks is a set of user interface components and elements united in 4 add-ons: Forms, Elements, E-commerce and Words. Beautiful and clear elements are easily combined with each other, as they are made in the same style. We have created for you hundreds of well-thought elements which will ideally fit your projects. How does it work? Take the desired component. You can change its appearance, color and text according to your needs. Use the resulting component in your design. Created on 12-grid system, they like fit together like puzzles. We have also drawn for you over 150 of vector icons in terms of this pack. All of them were based on 16-pixel grid. Bricks. Take a break from routine and work on new ideas.

item.title: GODDESSES AND SUBDITS
item.description: GODDESSES & SUBDITS SERIES 2012 //////////PROJECT IN PROGRESS///////////// This time I wanted to make an interpretation of the power of beauty and femininity over others. These goddesses, queens and princesses are at the top of their peers. They look over their shoulders and watch us from another dimension. They are powerful, magnetic, proud, coquette, dominant and they know how to cast their spell.. VENUE; JustMad Mia art fair 2012 Soho Studios at The Wynwood Convention Center 2136 NW 1st Avenue Miami, FL 33127 USA 6 9 December 2012 Open to the public: Thursday 6 from 14 to 20h. Friday 7, Saturday 8 from 12 to 20h. Sunday 9 from 12 to 19h. http://www.justmadmia.com/info-2/?lang=en

item.title: Scary Girl Totem
item.description: Nathan Jurevicius asked us to rework / reinterpret something from his fantastic Scary Girl series to celebrate her 10 year anniversary. Here it is, you can seen the final piece along with over a 100 other artists work held on Halloween night at Toy Tokyo's Underground Gallery New York.
item.content:encoded: Nathan Jurevicius asked us to rework / reinterpret something from his fantastic Scary Girl series to celebrate her 10 year anniversary. Here it is, you can seen the final piece along with over a 100 other artists work held on Halloween night at Toy Tokyo's Underground Gallery New York.

item.title: Steidl - Book Launch
item.description: Launch of the book "Room Service" by Karl Lagerfeld at Paris Photo. Managed event and book art/photography direction. Assisted publisher Gerhard Steidl on the production, design, printing and promotion of the book under the creative direction of Karl Lagerfeld. Right from the beginning, Karl Lagerfeld conceived "Room Service" as a multi-track matrix: a series of photos, a short film and an unusual version of the song Diamonds Are a Girls Best Friend, all collected in the same book. It all started when Lagerfeld was commissioned to create a campaign for Dom Pérignon Rosé Vintage 1996. He conceived an elegant exercise in style with a story line in the form of an ultra-contemporary fairy tale recounting the irresistible attraction of two strangers: a man and a woman, two solitary, seductive hedonists in a world of luxury whose paths cross at one of Pariss finest hotels. The woman is Eva Herzigova, and the man Brad Kroenig. Theres a sort of equality between them that allows for all sorts of freedom, says Lagerfeld. Basically, this story tells how Dom Pérignon Rosé facilitates this kind of encounter. Johan Rencks film was shot at almost the same time, in the same hotel, the George V, and with the same models/actors, Eva Herzigova and Brad Kroenig. Says Lagerfeld: Johan Renck is a music video genius. He liked the story and put it into action. He followed the script even more carefully than I could have done with still photos. For the song, Lagerfeld chose singer/songwriter Devendra Banhart. After Marilyn, who could have sung this song? A woman? I find Devendras low-high, ambiguous voice amazing and absolutely perfect. His version of Diamonds Are a Girls Best Friend is magnificent, unique and daring. The book with a pink metallic clothbound hardcover and an acetate dust jacket, includes a vinyl single by singer/songwriter Devendra Banhart and a single DVD of the ad campaign shot by Swedish director Johan Renck. This project was scanned, designed, produced and printed in-house at Steidl Verlag in Gottingën, Germany.
item.content:encoded: Launch of the book "Room Service" by Karl Lagerfeld at Paris Photo. Managed event and book art/photography direction. Assisted publisher Gerhard Steidl on the production, design, printing and promotion of the book under the creative direction of Karl Lagerfeld. Right from the beginning, Karl Lagerfeld conceived "Room Service" as a multi-track matrix: a series of photos, a short film and an unusual version of the song Diamonds Are a Girls Best Friend, all collected in the same book. It all started when Lagerfeld was commissioned to create a campaign for Dom Pérignon Rosé Vintage 1996. He conceived an elegant exercise in style with a story line in the form of an ultra-contemporary fairy tale recounting the irresistible attraction of two strangers: a man and a woman, two solitary, seductive hedonists in a world of luxury whose paths cross at one of Pariss finest hotels. The woman is Eva Herzigova, and the man Brad Kroenig. Theres a sort of equality between them that allows for all sorts of freedom, says Lagerfeld. Basically, this story tells how Dom Pérignon Rosé facilitates this kind of encounter. Johan Rencks film was shot at almost the same time, in the same hotel, the George V, and with the same models/actors, Eva Herzigova and Brad Kroenig. Says Lagerfeld: Johan Renck is a music video genius. He liked the story and put it into action. He followed the script even more carefully than I could have done with still photos. For the song, Lagerfeld chose singer/songwriter Devendra Banhart. After Marilyn, who could have sung this song? A woman? I find Devendras low-high, ambiguous voice amazing and absolutely perfect. His version of Diamonds Are a Girls Best Friend is magnificent, unique and daring. The book with a pink metallic clothbound hardcover and an acetate dust jacket, includes a vinyl single by singer/songwriter Devendra Banhart and a single DVD of the ad campaign shot by Swedish director Johan Renck. This project was scanned, designed, produced and printed in-house at Steidl Verlag in Gottingën, Germany.

item.title: Taller
item.description: El proyecto del taller fisicamente nace de la idea de encontrar alternativas al uso del suelo en la ciudad. Una estructura flexible que utiliza prefabricados en su construcción completa el espacio de trabajo inserto en el paisaje, de un predio en desuso. Esta adaptabilidad le da posibilidad al proyecto en terminos de negociacion del espacio. Lo cual se vuelve una posibilidad real en cuanto a costo y realización para gran parte de la población.
item.content:encoded: El proyecto del taller fisicamente nace de la idea de encontrar alternativas al uso del suelo en la ciudad. Una estructura flexible que utiliza prefabricados en su construcción completa el espacio de trabajo inserto en el paisaje, de un predio en desuso. Esta adaptabilidad le da posibilidad al proyecto en terminos de negociacion del espacio. Lo cual se vuelve una posibilidad real en cuanto a costo y realización para gran parte de la población.

item.title: 'LUCIA' (Graphic Novel)
item.description: Here is a selection of work from my upcoming Graphic Novel 'Lucia', My second Graphic novel but the first one I have both written and illustrated this is a tiny selection of pages and frames in no particular order most of which I have posted on my blog http://andyhixon.blogspot.com , the book is 96 pages full colour in total (ive been slaving away on this for the past 7 months on and off and it has now reached its pitching to publisher stage which is a job and a half in itself). The text is still needing some formatting its more a work in progress at the moment. I will upload alot more at a later stage. Andy
item.content:encoded: Here is a selection of work from my upcoming Graphic Novel 'Lucia', My second Graphic novel but the first one I have both written and illustrated this is a tiny selection of pages and frames in no particular order most of which I have posted on my blog http://andyhixon.blogspot.com , the book is 96 pages full colour in total (ive been slaving away on this for the past 7 months on and off and it has now reached its pitching to publisher stage which is a job and a half in itself). item.title: Playing Card Exploration
item.description: Recently I had a chance to work with a playing card company that sparked my excitement over developing backs to playing cards. Here is a collection of pieces I've developed in this personal exploration to challenge myself in new techniques.

item.title: Oxford University Clinical Research Unit
item.description: Oxford University Clinical Research Unit. Purposely ambiguous these coloured shapes feel scientific. They can be viewed as a sequence of chromosomes, a course of medical treatment, or a group of bacteria, even people. They may simply be a colorful respite in a sterile environment. What the sequence does represent is the process of searching for answers making sense out of something that at first has none. It represents problem solving and offers rewards to those that do. Very simply each letter represents a letter of the alphabet.
item.content:encoded: Oxford University Clinical Research Unit. Purposely ambiguous these coloured shapes feel scientific. They can be viewed as a sequence of chromosomes, a course of medical treatment, or a group of bacteria, even people. They may simply be a colorful respite in a sterile environment. What the sequence does represent is the process of searching for answers making sense out of something that at first has none. It represents problem solving and offers rewards to those that do. Very simply each letter represents a letter of the alphabet.

item.title: The Lost World watercolor patterns
item.description: These designs could be widely used in textile or fashion industry and in any other field. So I am open for any business proposals. Patterns were created with pencil and watercolor on watercolor paper. Then paintings were edited in Photoshop.
item.content:encoded: These designs could be widely used in textile or fashion industry and in any other field. So I am open for any business proposals. Patterns were created with pencil and watercolor on watercolor paper. Then paintings were edited in Photoshop.

item.title: Jpeople Magazine ?16
item.description: Dreams never end It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else. Erma Bombeck That is what we are doing in this issue. We are opening the magazine with an insight into what dreams mean to us. So let us take you to another journey about Truth, Styles & Imagination. This is our new Issue. ?16 soon in shops all over the world and online! - www.jpeoplemagazine.com

item.title: Washington Post Q Covers 2012
item.description: Over the last year I've been commissioned by the The Washington Post to create typographic illustrations for the cover of the Business section at the end of each financial quarter. These are the past 4.

item.title: Nike+ Training
item.description: Nike + Training is an interactive mobile application that interfaces wirelessly with shoes that are enabled with motion and pressure sensors. Allowing you to track how high you jump, how fast you move, and how intense your workout is. I spent two years playing a lead role in the design of the digital experience. Agency: R/GA Visual Credits Creative Director: Wade Convay Art Director: Saulo Rodrigues Lead Designers: Erik Finsrud, Ty Saunders Other contributors: Young Seo, Jordan Fripp Photos: Saulo Rodrigues
item.content:encoded: Nike + Training is an interactive mobile application that interfaces wirelessly with shoes that are enabled with motion and pressure sensors. Allowing you to track how high you jump, how fast you move, and how intense your workout is. I spent two years playing a lead role in the design of the digital experience. Agency: R/GA Visual Credits Creative Director: Wade Convay Art Director: Saulo Rodrigues Lead Designers: Erik Finsrud, Ty Saunders Other contributors: Young Seo, Jordan Fripp Photos: Saulo Rodrigues

item.title: Doha Film Institute
item.description: Working closely with the Doha Film Institute (DFI), an independent cultural organization based in Qatar, we developed a comprehensive and highly flexible identity and design system. The DFI brand campaign "I am Film" features an on-going portrait project by photographer Brigitte Lacombe focusing on the iconic and emerging figures of the Arab film industry. Building on DFI's mission of promoting, educating and cultivating passion for great filmmaking, we continue to work with DFI and its annual film event, the Doha Tribeca Film Festival (DTFF) a cultural partnership with Tribeca Enterprises to create campaigns, events, exhibitions, publications and branded collateral in Qatar and its satellite locations in New York, Paris, and Cannes. Our work for the 2011 DTFF includes a mile-long billboard of 600 Lacombe portraits surrounding the Katara Cultural Village where the festival takes place, books documenting the "I am Film" project and the making of the Jean-Jacques Annaud film "Black Gold," and environmental projections and signage throughout the event.
item.content:encoded: Working closely with the Doha Film Institute (DFI), an independent cultural organization based in Qatar, we developed a comprehensive and highly flexible identity and design system. The DFI brand campaign "I am Film" features an on-going portrait project by photographer Brigitte Lacombe focusing on the iconic and emerging figures of the Arab film industry. Building on DFI's mission of promoting, educating and cultivating passion for great filmmaking, we continue to work with DFI and its annual film event, the Doha Tribeca Film Festival (DTFF) a cultural partnership with Tribeca Enterprises to create campaigns, events, exhibitions, publications and branded collateral in Qatar and its satellite locations in New York, Paris, and Cannes. Our work for the 2011 DTFF includes a mile-long billboard of 600 Lacombe portraits surrounding the Katara Cultural Village where the festival takes place, books documenting the "I am Film" project and the making of the Jean-Jacques Annaud film "Black Gold," and environmental projections and signage throughout the event.

item.title: Typography / RBNo2.1
item.description: RBNo2.1 is a condensed sans serif typeface with a technical and geometric appearance. The family includes 2 versions (RBNo2.1a and RBNo2.1b) and has 7 weights with matching italics. RBNo2.1 feels comfortable in technical surroundings with short text passages, in brochures, catalogs, magazines, posters, websites headlines and logos.
item.content:encoded: RBNo2.1 is a condensed sans serif typeface with a technical and geometric appearance. The family includes 2 versions (RBNo2.1a and RBNo2.1b) and has 7 weights with matching italics. RBNo2.1 feels comfortable in technical surroundings with short text passages, in brochures, catalogs, magazines, posters, websites headlines and logos.

item.title: Crocodile 60th Anniversary Brand Book
item.description: Established in 1952, Crocodile is an apparel brand that is well known as the Shirt Expert in 50s & 60s. It has more than 1,600 stores throughout Hong Kong, Macau and Mainland China. To celebrate their 60th anniversary, Crocodile first published their brand book to share their brand history. The old photos and interesting stories recall the memory and history of Hong Kong as well. We have used a vintage style layout to match with the old photos and stories.
item.content:encoded: Established in 1952, Crocodile is an apparel brand that is well known as the Shirt Expert in 50s & 60s. It has more than 1,600 stores throughout Hong Kong, Macau and Mainland China. To celebrate their 60th anniversary, Crocodile first published their brand book to share their brand history. The old photos and interesting stories recall the memory and history of Hong Kong as well. We have used a vintage style layout to match with the old photos and stories.

item.title: Custom Built Orchestra
item.description: Diego has always been fascinated by the raw musical power that an orchestra can express, so, after creating a series of videos where he performs a multi-track piece with an instrument he designed, he decided to take the concept a step farther and create his own orchestra made of unusually unique instruments. The project started by handcrafting a diverse selection of instruments, then he wrote a composition where he could fit them all in and finally he performed each part.
item.content:encoded: Diego has always been fascinated by the raw musical power that an orchestra can express, so, after creating a series of videos where he performs a multi-track piece with an instrument he designed, he decided to take the concept a step farther and create his own orchestra made of unusually unique instruments. The project started by handcrafting a diverse selection of instruments, then he wrote a composition where he could fit them all in and finally he performed each part.
